magic_surge_fey.description: The spell explodes in a dazzling spectacle of light, and all creatures within the area of effect, or within 5 feet of the spell, are blinded until the start of their next turn.
A fountain of healing erupts from the epicenter of the spell, healing all creatures within the area of effect for five times the level of the cast spell.
All creatures within a 30-foot radius of the spell or the caster who are wearing or carrying metal are immediately affected by the Heat Metal spell. The DC is the same as the caster's spell save DC.
The spell's area of effect increases by half. If the spell has no area of effect, it gains a 10-foot radius area of effect.
If the spell deals damage, the damage type changes to poison. If the spell doesn't deal damage, the caster is poisoned by a random poison for 1 minute.
If the spell deals damage, the damage is doubled. Apply the same effect if it's healing. For other effects, roll again.
If the spell deals damage, the damage is halved. Apply the same effect if it's healing. For other effects, roll again.
The target of the spell gain the benefits of the Haste spell for 1 round.
The caster and the target of the spell are slowed under the effect of the Slow spell for 1 round.
Mushrooms and fungi sprout from the caster for 2 rounds. Each round, roll 1d10 and the caster regains that many hit points if even, or loses that many hit points if odd.
Plants seem to be very friendly to the target of the spell for 1d4 hours.
You cast Fireball spell centered on yourself.
If there's a tree within 120 feet of the caster, it immediately becomes a Treant under the DM's control. It has no loyalty to any creature and may fight for anyone who convinces it.
A random fey (sprite, pixie, redcap, etc.) appears immediately and swears eternal loyalty to the caster. It disappears after 1d6 days unless the group completes a mission for the fey.
If there are plants within 60 feet of the caster, they become irritated with the caster and become more sentient. They transform into a Shambling Mound that immediately attacks the caster.
The next spell cast by anyone will be nullified by Counterspell.
All food within 120 feet of the spell becomes sentient with an Intelligence of 8 (-1) and can speak Sylvan.
The spell seems to fail when cast, but occurs 1d2 rounds later.
Flowers explode like confetti from the target of the spell and they become allergic to pollen for 2d4 hours.
You cast Fireball as a 4rd-level spell centered on yourself.
A magical mist covers the area in a 30-foot radius, obscuring vision until the end of the caster's next turn.
A gentle rain of light falls on all creatures within a 60-foot radius, granting advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks for 1 hour.
The target of the spell gains resistance to all damage types for 1 round.
The target of the spell becomes vulnerable to all damage types for 1 round.
A rainbow appears in the sky and spreads, but the caster's vision becomes blurry for 1d4 rounds.
The caster and everyone within 30 feet feel drowsy, reducing their speed by half for 1d4 rounds.
Faerie Fire is cast centered on the caster.
The target of the spell is surrounded by an aura of thick smoke (5 feet), making them unable to see or hear clearly for 1d4 rounds.
The caster and all allies within a 30-foot radius are enveloped in a wave of heat that deals 2d6 points of damage.
The caster and all enemies within a 30-foot radius are enveloped in a wave of heat that deals 2d6 points of damage.
All metal items within a 30-foot radius of the caster become extremely cold and start to freeze, dealing 3d4 points of damage per round to anyone touching or in contact with them for 1d2 rounds.
The caster becomes ethereal for 1d2 rounds, unable to interact with the physical world.
You cast Fireball as a 4rd-level spell centered on yourself.
The Ice Storm spell forms at a random point within a 30-foot radius from the caster.
The caster is covered by a layer of magical mud that halves their speed and causes disadvantage on Athletics checks for 1d4 rounds.
Grease is cast centered on the caster.
A group of small fairies appears and starts feeding on the caster's items, causing the loss of 1 random small or medium item.
The Silence spell is cast on 1 random square adjacent to the caster.

The caster and the target of the spell are enveloped in an aura of electric shock, dealing 1d6 points of lightning damage to anyone who approaches within 10 feet until the start of the caster's next turn.
The caster is covered by a layer of magical darkness that makes them invisible, but all sounds they make are amplified for 1d2 rounds.
The caster is transformed into a small and harmless creature for 1d2 rounds.
The target of the spell is hit by a strong magical wind that pushes them 1d3 squares away.
The caster is surrounded by a poison aura, dealing 1d6 points of poison damage to all creatures that touch them for 1d4 rounds.
The caster and everyone within 30 feet are covered by a layer of magical dust that causes intense itching and disadvantage on Constitution checks for 1d4 hours.
The caster and all allies within 60 feet are attacked by a cloud of magical insects that deal 1d6 points of damage per round until the end of the next turn.
The caster applies Resistance to a hostile target in melee range, or in the absence of an enemy, they cast it on a random ally.
The caster and the target of the spell are enveloped by a cloud of poisonous smoke that deals 1d4 points of poison damage per round until the start of the caster's next turn.
The target of the spell is affected by the Mirror Image spell.
The caster is forced to emit a loud and disturbing sound that causes all allies within 30 feet to have disadvantage on attacks and saves in the next round.
The caster and the target of the spell are attacked by the Cloud of Daggers spell. Apply the damage this round.
The caster is surrounded by an aura of magical corruption that deals 1d4 points of necrotic damage per round to all within 10 feet of them.
All enemies within a 60-foot radius are enveloped by a regeneration aura that heals 1d4 hit points per round until the end of the caster's next turn.
Sleet Storm is conjured 1d4+8 squares away from the caster in a random direction.
The caster casts Tasha's Hideous Laughter on a random target.
The caster and all allies within 30 feet are affected by the Sleep spell (10d8).

magic_surge.description: Roll on this table at the start of each of your turns for 1d4 rounds.
For the next minute, you can see any invisible creature if you have line of sight to it.
A modron chosen and controlled by the DM appears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of you, then disappears 1 minute later.
You cast Fireball as a 3rd-level spell centered on yourself.
You cast Magic Missile as a 5th-level spell.
Roll a d10. Your height changes by a number of inches equal to the roll. If the roll is odd, you shrink. If the roll is even, you grow.
You cast Confusion centered on yourself.
For the next minute, you regain 5 hit points at the start of each of your turns.
You grow a long beard made of feathers that remains until you sneeze, at which point the feathers explode out of your face.
You cast Grease centered on yourself.
Creatures have disadvantage on saving throws against the next spell you cast in the next minute that involves a saving throw.
Your skin turns a vibrant shade of blue. A Remove Curse spell can end this effect.
An eye appears on the back of your head for the next minute. During that time, you have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
For the next minute, all your spells with a casting time of 1 action have a casting time of 1 bonus action.
You teleport up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space of your choice that you can see.
You are transported to the Astral Plane until the end of your next turn, after which time you return to the space you previously occupied or the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied.
Maximize the damage of the next damaging spell you cast within the next minute.
Roll a d10. Your age changes by a number of years equal to the roll. If the roll is odd, you get younger (minimum 1 year old). If the roll is even, you get older.
1d6 flumphs controlled by the DM appear in unoccupied spaces within 60 feet of you and are frightened of you. They vanish after 1 minute.
You regain 2d10 hit points.

You turn into a potted plant until the start of your next turn. While a plant, you are incapacitated and have vulnerability to all damage. If you drop to 0 hit points, your pot breaks, and your form reverts.
For the next minute, you can teleport up to 20 feet as a bonus action on each of your turns.
You cast Levitate on yourself.
A unicorn controlled by the DM appears in a space within 5 feet of you, then disappears 1 minute later.
You can't speak for the next minute. Whenever you try, pink bubbles float out of your mouth.
A spectral shield hovers near you for the next minute, granting you a +2 bonus to AC and immunity to Magic Missile.
You are immune to being intoxicated by alcohol for the next 5d6 days.
Your hair falls out but grows back within 24 hours.
For the next minute, any flammable object you touch that isn't being worn or carried by another creature bursts into flame.
You regain your lowest-level expended spell slot.
For the next minute, you must shout when you speak.
You cast Fog Cloud centered on yourself.
Up to three creatures you choose within 30 feet of you take 4d10 lightning damage.
You are frightened by the nearest creature until the end of your next turn.
Each creature within 30 feet of you becomes invisible for the next minute. The invisibility ends on a creature when it attacks or casts a spell.
You gain resistance to all damage for the next minute.
A random creature within 30 feet of you becomes poisoned for 1d4 hours.
You glow with bright light in a 30-foot radius for the next minute. Any creature that ends its turn within 5 feet of you is blinded until the end of its next turn.
You cast Polymorph on yourself. If you fail the saving throw, you turn into a sheep for the spell's duration.
Illusory butterflies and flower petals flutter in the air within 10 feet of you for the next minute.
You can take one additional action immediately.
Each creature within 30 feet of you takes 1d10 necrotic damage. You regain hit points equal to the sum of the necrotic damage dealt.
You cast Mirror Image.
You cast Fly on a random creature within 60 feet of you.
You become invisible for the next minute. During that time, other creatures can't hear you. The invisibility ends if you attack or cast a spell.
If you die within the next minute, you immediately come back to life as if by the Reincarnate spell.
Your size increases by one category for the next minute.
You and all creatures within 30 feet of you gain vulnerability to piercing damage for the next minute.
You are surrounded by faint, ethereal music for the next minute.
You recover all expended spell slots.
